Spain's Madrid region partially revokes trans, LGBTQ rights lawsMadrid's regional assembly on Friday passed a proposal by the Spanish capital's ruling conservative People's Party (PP) to strip back protections for transgender people, sparking outcry from the opposition and LGBTQ activists. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 18:28:45 GMT Y3BBKHNJDNPPHKCTXCMQIYKZ5E https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/spain-madrid-region-partially-revokes-trans-lgbtq-rights-laws-2023-12-22/David Latona世界欧洲
'Shoot here!': reporter screams at Prague gunman to help people flee"Hey, you fucker, here I am, shoot here!" screamed a Czech reporter trying to distract a gunman who killed 14 people at a university building in Prague on Thursday, helping people to flee the country's worst mass shooting. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 18:08:20 GMT WKAMZ7SNPZI7DOQHBHROJZKSJY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/shoot-here-reporter-screams-prague-gunman-help-people-flee-2023-12-22/Radan Sprongl世界欧洲
Russia completes buyouts of 92 foreign-owned planesRussia has bought out another 92 planes from foreign leasing companies, airlines and aircraft leasing company AerCap said. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 18:06:20 GMT KQEFYQ33WRNTRIGHT25646RUNQ https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/ Russia-completes-buyouts-92-foreign-owned-planes-2023-12-22/Reuters商业航空航天与国防
Ex-Colombian soldier pleads guilty in Haiti president's assassinationA former Colombian soldier pleaded guilty in a U.S. court on Friday to charges related to his accused role in the 2021 assassination of Haitian President Jovenel Moise. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 17:50:19 GMT E6W5G44YEVK25D2DVRPSOLCVMY https://www.reuters.com/world/ex-colombian-soldier-pleads-guilty-of-assassination-of-haiti-presidents-2023-12-22/Sarah Morland, Kylie Madry世界
Cuba quietly authorizes euthanasiaCuba on Friday became the second country in Latin America and the Caribbean to authorize euthanasia, following Colombia. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 17:32:40 GMT EVI4FZPFRFMPRPDMEPGD2HSRKA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/cuba-quietly-authorizes-euthanasia-2023-12-22/Marc Frank, Nelson Acosta世界美洲
Paris Olympics river closure could sow harvest chaos, grain industry saysTraffic restrictions on the river Seine during next summer's Olympics in Paris, including a week-long closure before the opening ceremony, could upend grain transport in the midst of the harvest in the EU's top exporter, an industry group warned. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 17:31:49 GMT N4ZRJETGEZKUZL3USW426NSNOI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/paris-olympics-river-closure-could-sow-harvest-chaos-grain-industry-says-2023-12-22/Reuters世界欧洲
UN Security Council acts to boost aid to Gaza after US abstainsThe United Nations Security Council on Friday approved a toned-down bid to boost humanitarian aid to the Gaza Strip and called for urgent steps "to create the conditions for a sustainable cessation of hostilities" after a week of vote delays and intense negotiations to avoid a veto by the United States. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 17:10:20 GMT TP7JLAY6NFOBJPQ5COQUFPFUAM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-security-council-acts-boost-aid-gaza-after-we-abstain-2023-12-22/Michelle Nichols世界中东地区
Only gauze and iodine for injured patients at Gaza field hospitalAll Palestinian surgeon Bashir al-Hourani has to work with in the central Gaza school where he helps run a field clinic amid Israel's pounding offensive is gauze and disinfectant as he treats walking wounded turned away from overstretched hospitals. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 16:19:55 GMT EV6XXCDK7ROMTA6T374X7NBGZM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/only-gauze-iodine-injured-病人-gaza-field-hospital-2023-12-22/Reuters世界中东地区
Poland hopes truckers dispute can be solved by year-endPoland's deputy infrastructure minister said on Friday, after a meeting in Kyiv, that he hoped truckers' protests on the border with Ukraine could be solved before the end of the year. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 16:13:52 GMT JXKKZKWOPVO4JJDRIPBBWST2H4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/poland-hopes-truckers-protests-could-be-resolved-by-year-end-2023-12-22/Reuters世界欧洲
Former Ecuador VP asks for asylum in Mexico -lawyerFormer Ecuadorean Vice President Jorge Glas, convicted twice for corruption, has asked Mexico for political asylum, arguing he is being persecuted by the attorney general's office, his lawyer said on Friday. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 16:11:29 GMT 7CRQIJFFF5JNJEBV6KVJZ5H22I https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/former-ecuador-vp-asks-asylum-mexican-lawyer-2023-12-22/Alexandra Valencia世界美洲
Mexican president to boost measures aimed at curbing migrationMexican President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador said on Friday his government plans to reinforce measures aimed at containing migration as he seeks to assist the United States in dealing with record numbers of people trying to reach the U.S. border. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 15:39:13 GMT 3SQLYWR4XJL4HOMFL7HFS4EAEI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexican-president-boost-measures-aimed-at-curbing-migration-2023-12-22/Reuters世界美洲
